title: mitch_connor
author: mitch_connor
content: TWITCH SERVICES​I would like to introduce you to our service that will help you earn a regular financial income and improve your account statistics. Our Services team helps streamers get better account stats and earn money at the same time!• We provide services for:- Followers, Prime Subs, Bits, Viewers, Affiliate Accounts• Why should you choose us?-we pass on our long-term experience to our customers and we stick to the rule that a satisfied customer is the key to success. We have a great team that will be happy to help you at any time.• Anonymity and privacy-Customer data remains completely secure. Customer data will never be passed on to third parties.• completley legal- All our products are obtained by legal methods. We don't support any illegal activities!• Support- Our support team are here for you. With them, you can easily resolve any questions and get answers. You can contact us with Skype or DM• Safety- The services we operate are carried out by using rotating proxies that guarantee secure delivery to your account.• Quick- Offers are resolved within 24 hours.• Payment- Bitcoin, Ether, USDT, USDC, Litecoin• Refunds- Refunds will only be made if the product ordered is no longer available. After delivery the sale is final and we do not provide refunds.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Our Twitch Bits allow you to make more money on Twitch than ever before. Here is some more info:1.) 1000 bits = $10 pure revenue for your channel. Bits have no fees or taxes. Twitch will always add a fixed $10 to your channel revenue for every 1000 bits you get!2.) All you need to get bits is an affiliate account3.) Payout rate highly depends on your online (viewers avg / streaming time). Twitch mostly pays out to active users. If you have been paid before, Twitch should pay you again. The payout rate for partnered       channels is more than 90% .4.) We offer a drip feed service from our side to increase your payout chances to the maximum. This means we can send just a few thousand bits (1-5k) bits on a daily basis until we finish your order. You can choose       your preferred daily amount of bitsBITS1000 - 4999 Bits - $8 per 1000 Bits5000 - 9999 Bits - $7 per 1000 Bits10.000 - 24.999 Bits - $6 per 1000 Bits25.000 - 49.999 Bits - $5,90 per 1000 Bits50.000 - 99.999 Bits - $5 per 1000 Bits100.000+ Bits - 4,50$ per 1000 Bits​I only guarantee delivery of Bits. I can't guarantee payment to everyone. Buying to many Bits at once could be dangerous for your payout. (dont be to greedy)-------------------------------------------------------------------------------TWITCH AFFILATED ACCOUNTSPrice: $50We can provide discount for bulk orders (10+) accounts​- Without 5th step (might as for ID because of Twitch update)- fully onboarded- Ready to receive money from bits, subs, ads (contract must be finished - payment method added)- Real nicknames, already streamed few hours- You can change email and add 2fa- Each account was created through own IP address, so each account is unique- Each account receives 300+ followers for free. we can provide accounts up to 50.000+ Followers if you wish- Not Stolen, carded or Whatever-------------------------------------------------------------------------------PRIME SUBS1-9 Subs – 1,20$ per Sub10-49 Subs - 1$ per Sub50-249 Subs - 0.90$ per Sub249+ Subs- 0.70$ per Sub​- Each sub gives $1.80-2.50 to your channel revenue (depending on your country taxes). All you need to get subs is an affiliate account!- All our subs are self-created (not cracked or carded). This means that Twitch will never ban or suspend you for illegal actions. Just don't be too greedy and order 100 subs for 1 day to inactive channels.- We offer a drip feed service from our side to increase your payout chances to maximum. This means we can send just a few (1-10) subs with our private proxies on a daily basis until we finish your order.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------VIEWERS & FOLLOWERS BOOSTFollowers have realistic usernames & profile pictures. Followers delivery to your channel takes up to 48hFollowers400-10K ($9 / 1K)10K-25K ($8 / 1K)25K-100K ($7 / 1K)-------------------------------------------------------------------------------​We offer 1 week / 1 month plans. That means you will be able to get viewers 24 / 7 for purchased period. A bit more info about our viewers:You will get viewers every time you start your stream. Usually it came just in few minutes since you start streamingMonthly Live Viewers25 Viewers - $4130 Viewers - $4635 Viewers - $5340 Viewers - $6045 Viewers - $6850 Viewers - $7675 Viewers - $114100 Viewers - $150125 Viewers - $96.25150 Viewers - $230Weekly Live Viewers25 Viewers - $1530 Viewers - $1835 Viewers - $2240 Viewers - $2445 Viewers - $2850 Viewers - $3275 Viewers - $46100 Viewers - $60125 Viewers - $76150 Viewers - $90Want a specific amount of Live Viewers?That's possible, just contact me and we'll work something outCustom delay between each follower, a minimum of 1 and maximum of 1720 sec.​Contact Info:Skype: live:.cid.708730d247808531TG: @tr0z0
